players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was found dead during the night, so we lost one of us already. We should focus on gathering clues and watching each other's behavior carefully."
Diana: "Charlie, I agree we need to be careful. Since Bob was killed last night, maybe we should start by sharing any suspicions or strange behavior we've noticed so far."
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out immediately."
Diana: "I understand why Alice would say that, but accusing me so quickly seems suspicious. Alice, can you provide any proof to back up your claim?"
You: "My investigation result is clear: Diana is mafia. We can't afford to hesitate when we have confirmed information."

Charlie: "Alice, if your investigation is true, then voting Diana out now is the best move. But Diana's reaction seems genuine, so we should be sure. I suggest we vote Diana today but watch Alice closely for any inconsistencies tomorrow."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
